tool_description: This API endpoint provides information about the top male goal scorers for a given nation in international football matches. It allows users to retrieve the list of highest-scoring players from different countries and their corresponding goal counts.All you want to learn the integration you can check this website https://howtofixthebugs.com
name: Top international male goal scorers by nation - upto 2023
title: Top international male goal scorers by nation - upto 2023
tool_name: Top international male goal scorers by nation - upto 2023

api_list.name: players
api_list.description: To fetch all the api data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-international-male-goal-scorers-by-nation-upto-2023.p.rapidapi.com/read"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-international-male-goal-scorers-by-nation-upto-2023.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
